annotations.description: This drink was created by Brent Falco for Cole's French Dip and was on the menu when I started there. It is a fantastic drink, one of the first that I learne...
annotations.title: A Red Car Named Desire

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Rye Whiskey
.5oz (15ml) Cynar
.5oz (15ml) Maurin Quina
.5oz (15ml) Maraschino Liqueur
Orange Twist

Stir and strain into coupe
Garnish with orange twist

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qn0jtDF5Evg
title: A Red Car Named Desire (Red Car)
